text: Inaivaittu vanankupavarkal kurukinranar: â€˜â€˜Allah natiyiruntal nankalum enkal mutataikalum avanait tavira marretaiyum vanankiye irukkamattom; avanutaiya kattalaiyinri etaiyum (akatatenat) tatuttirukkavum mattom.'' Ivvare ivarkalukku munniruntavarkalum (vin vitantavatam) ceytu kontiruntanar. Nam tutarkalmitu (avarkalukkitappatta kattalaiyai) telivaka arivippatait tavira (veretuvum) poruppunta? (Kitaiyatu)
